name: The Mystery Of Ambrose Manor
description:
You have arrived at this old, Victorian manor. You were supposed to marry Dr. Ambrose, an experienced explorer, and philosopher, but after entering, he was nowhere to be seen. You tried to leave, but now you are trapped. Is there something in the house that can help you escape?

Credits:

  • Programmers: Anna Mortimer & Alastor Guzman
  • UI Design: Anna Mortimer
  • Level Design: Anna Mortimer
  • Narrative Design: Alastor Guzman
  • Sound Design: Alastor Guzman
  • Character Design: Miya A
